short_description: angel paws utah is a veterinarians & animal hospital based in utah, united states.
long_description: a 501c3 organization dedicated to providing resources to improve the lives of the most at-risk animals in our community. angel paws veterinary services is utah's only veterinary clinic that focuses on providing medical care to homeless pets being cared for by shelters and nonprofit rescue groups. this includes preventative services such as spaying and neutering, vaccinations and wellness visits, as well as treatment for illness or injuries. angel paws academy offers a variety of classes, camps, presentations, and even parties celebrating our relationship with animals, and teaching children of all ages animal safety, kindness, compassion and responsibility. join us at fisher brewing company located at 320 east 800 south slc<\/p>. by purchasing our official logo t-shirts, hoodies, and long-sleeve shirts, you'll be directly supporting the life-saving work we do for utah's most vulnerable pets. angel paws is the only clinic in utah dedicated solely to providing veterinary care to animals in shelters and rescues.
